title: L-Twoo Aims To Offer Electronic Groupset Performance at a Budget Price: Taipei Cycle Show 2024
content:
Chinese component manufacturer L-Twoo brings what they call a high-performance electronic shifting with some genuine innovation to boot.

Read the full article at L-Twoo Aims To Offer Electronic Groupset Performance at a Budget Price: Taipei Cycle Show 2024 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
